changeSet.sql: create schema "persons_and_cars"; CREATE TABLE car_shop.persons_and_cars.persons( person_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, surname VARCHAR(100) not null, personname VARCHAR(100) not null, role_user VARCHAR not null, login VARCHAR(100) not null unique, password_person VARCHAR(100) not null ); CREATE TABLE car_shop.persons_and_cars.cars( car_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, brand VARCHAR(100) not null, model VARCHAR(100) not null, yearOfCarProduction integer not null, car_price numeric not null, car_condition VARCHAR(100) not null, car_status VARCHAR(100) not null );
